A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredibly disappointing Star Wars entry and I can’t believe it is rating in the 90% range from critics. SPOILERS I really wanted to love this film and I am a huge Star Wars fan but there are things about it that can’t be overlooked. All of the Rebel Resistance scenes seem like a waste of time. The writing is really poor on this film. The ‘big reveal’ of Rey’s parents is completely anti-climatic and meaningless. Leia’s survival in space due to the force just seemed stupid. And Luke...we don’t get the Jedi mature Luke\, but the whiny Star Wars Luke for most of the movie. Rey also seemed to get lost in this movie...and Chewie is barely in the movie for just a couple of jokey things. Even Yoda’s cameo was a wasted opportunity. It just seemed poorly written\, and almost forced - like\, it was going to be a Star Wars movie whether you liked it or not. The ‘adventure’ aspect was actually kind of boring and the stupid casino scene was really dumb. There were a lot of dumb things and poor plot choices\, like killing off Snoke as if he is just a meaningless stormtrooper. I did like Kylo for the most part but as a whole I thought this movie was a real let down\, which is really too bad.
